alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 2:14PM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Bennett County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
